item.title: Openebs Jiva Performance Timings
item.description:
Introdution

What sort of performance impact does Jiva replication have on drive performance in K8s? I wasn’t able to find any recent, quick numbers, so I did some quick and slopping testing for myself and was shocked by the results…

Jiva volumes with a replication factor of two saw an 83% drop in throughput capacity. Three volume replication was even worse, weighing in at an 87% drop in performance.

In all fairness, I’m mostly living in the land of default options, but that much of a reduction in performance is dramatic.
